title: Special meeting of party leaders to convene virtually
body_lines: Speaker of Parliament, Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena, has decided to call a virtual meeting of political party leaders this afternoon (May 11).
Accordingly, the meeting will take place at 3.00 p.m. today.
The focus of today’s meeting is expected to fall on the measures to be taken to resolve the political turmoil in the country.

The meeting was previously scheduled to be held at the Parliament Complex this afternoon, however, it was cancelled over concerns about the safety of parliamentarians as public furore against politicians erupted following the attack on two main anti-government protest sites in Colombo.
The Speaker previously stated that a party leaders’ meeting would not be convened until the safety of the parliamentarians is ensured.
